SEARCH
Package com.example.chance.controller

Class FirebaseManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.chance.controller.FirebaseManager
public class FirebaseManager extends Object
FirebaseManager centralizes all Firestore and Storage operations. Other controllers interact with Firebase through this class.
